It seems that using @tf.RegisterGradient doesn't work, as it is specific to a certain op.type (which is always PyFunc here), and not to op.name.
The only way to set op.type seems to be to define a custom C++ op.
Did I miss something, or can someone confirm this?
Would be nice if I could define custom gradients for my Python ops.

body:
It seems that using `@tf.RegisterGradient` doesn't work, as it is specific to a certain `op.type` (which is always `PyFunc` here), and not to `op.name`.
The only way to set `op.type` seems to be to define a custom C++ op.
Did I miss something, or can someone confirm this?
Would be nice if I could define custom gradients for my Python ops.
